decision_conditions: Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted ( 60480582-TR-TF-EL-01 received on 13th September 2016 and 60480582-TR-TF-GA-01 received on 7 October 2016.) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The permission hereby granted shall be for a limited period expiring on 30 April 2018 when the use shall cease
description: Proposed temporary use of land for Local Authority waste vehicle fleet parking at Southall Lane, with a temporary surface, together with a temporary bin store and temporary works compound with staff parking, associated with the construction of the Southall Lane Waste Depot (approved under reference: 01032/I/P1). Temporary consent for eighteen (18) month period.
